citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility did not have veterinary approval for environmental enhancement practices at the time of inspection. The
environmental enhancement plan, including specifications for social grouping, environmental enrichment and birds
requiring special care, and approved by the veterinarian, ensures appropriate methods for avian welfare are in place. The
facility must ensure that the environmental enhancement plan is fully documented and is approved by the veterinarian.
Correct by January 14, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility did not have veterinary approval  for environmental  enhancement practices at the time of inspection. The 
environmental  enhancement plan, including specifications for social grouping, environmental  enrichment and birds 
requiring special care, and approved  by the veterinarian,  ensures appropriate methods for avian welfare are in place. The 
facility must ensure that the environmental  enhancement plan is fully documented and is approved  by the veterinarian. 
 
Correct by January 14, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
